title: Hotel Laurel no Wataridoritachi
description:
"Why are we staying here?"

Adam B. Brown wakes up in a strange and luxurious hotel room. He was in the midst of a sumptuous feast and enough alcohol to drown himself. The latest novel by a famous author that never existed. A wedding full of dreams with the love of your life. This hotel can fulfill any wish of its guests. Is this heaven?!

A grand hotel story of strange migratory birds entertained by a perfect concierge!
author: Akagawa Sagan
